data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Eleazara Distant (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae, Ledrinae) in Malaysia, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Weijian, Zhang, Yalin (2018): First record of the genus Eleazara Distant (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae, Ledrinae) in Malaysia, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4532 (3): 434-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.3.7
